_header: O Christ Thou hast restored my soul
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; alchemy; introductions to prose texts
_description: Prefatory prayer to an alchemical tract — one quatrain

CopenRoy3500.Transcription:
O Christe thou hast restorede my soulewith gold nor yet with
                    feebut euen with thy most precious bloodthou has redeemed
                    me
CopenRoy3500.Note:
Transcription from Stephens (1854)
XStephens,  George. 
             “Anecdota Literaria: Catalogue of the English Manuscripts in the Great
                National Library, Copenhagen.” 
             Retrospective Review
         2 (1854): 407-16, 415.
